thread.title: What's behind seeing the northern lights so far south | Nation | timesdaily.com
thread.title_full: What's behind seeing the northern lights so far south | Nation | timesdaily.com

title: What's behind seeing the northern lights so far south | Nation | timesdaily.com
text: Another in a series of unusually strong solar storms hitting Earth produced stunning skies full of pinks, purples, greens and blues farther south than normal, including into parts of Germany, the United Kingdom, New England and New York City.
